attributes.action: To provide School Children and young adults with a better education concerning the referendum on the UK's membership of the EU
attributes.additional_details:
1. Leaving the EU, will cause huge ,economic, political and social change within the UK.
2. Children (the future voters) and some adults,have very little idea about what consequences the UK will suffer if the UK stays in the EU, or leaves the establishment.
3.Provide a sufficient and most importantly fair education school children and young adults so that the UK makes the right decision when the referendum on the UK's membership of the EU takes place
